title: Beginner's Oil Painting: Still Life
subtitle: Learn the fundamentals of oil painting techniques and color theory.
description: This course is a comprehensive introduction to oil painting for beginners. You will learn to mix colors, handle brushes, and complete your first still life painting.

title: Watercolor Landscapes for All Levels
subtitle: Create beautiful landscape paintings with easy-to-follow watercolor techniques.
description: Discover the magic of watercolors. This course covers everything from basic washes to detailed layering, helping you paint stunning landscapes.

title: Figure Drawing: Anatomy and Form
subtitle: Master the art of drawing the human figure with a focus on anatomy.
description: This course provides a deep dive into figure drawing, teaching you how to understand and render human anatomy and form accurately. Ideal for aspiring artists.

title: Sketchbook Habit: Daily Drawing Prompts
subtitle: Build a consistent drawing habit with fun and creative prompts.
description: A course designed to help you overcome creative block and make drawing a daily part of your life. Includes a new prompt every day.

title: Introduction to Clay Sculpture
subtitle: Learn to create three-dimensional art with your hands.
description: This hands-on course covers the basics of clay sculpting, including tools, techniques, and firing processes. Perfect for those new to the medium.

title: Bronze Casting: From Wax to Metal
subtitle: A detailed guide to the ancient art of bronze casting.
description: Explore the complex and rewarding process of bronze casting, from creating a wax model to the final patina. This course is for serious sculpture artists.

title: Pottery Basics: Hand Building Techniques
subtitle: Learn foundational pottery skills like pinching, coiling, and slab building.
description: This course is perfect for those without a pottery wheel. It teaches you how to create beautiful and functional pieces using just your hands and simple tools.

title: Wheel Throwing: The Art of the Pot
subtitle: Master the pottery wheel to create bowls, vases, and more.
description: A step-by-step guide to working on the pottery wheel. Learn centering, pulling, and trimming to create perfectly symmetrical forms.

title: Modern Calligraphy for Beginners
subtitle: Create elegant, handwritten letters with a simple dip pen.
description: Learn the beautiful art of modern calligraphy. This course covers the basics of holding the pen, forming letters, and creating your own unique style.

title: Arabic Calligraphy: Thuluth Script
subtitle: A masterclass in the classic Thuluth style of Arabic script.
description: Dive into the intricate world of Arabic calligraphy. This course provides detailed instruction on mastering the beautiful and complex Thuluth script.

title: Procreate for Illustrators
subtitle: Unlock the power of digital drawing on your iPad.
description: Learn to use Procreate, the industry-standard app for digital artists. This course covers everything from brush customization to creating full illustrations.

title: Photoshop Painting: From Photo to Art
subtitle: Transform your photographs into painterly masterpieces.
description: This course teaches you how to use Photoshop's tools and brushes to digitally paint over a photograph, creating a unique and artistic look.

title: Wood Carving for Beginners
subtitle: Discover the art of shaping wood with simple tools.
description: This course introduces you to the basics of wood carving, including safety, tool selection, and carving techniques to create simple objects.

title: Building a Modern Bookshelf
subtitle: A step-by-step guide to building your own piece of furniture.
description: Learn how to measure, cut, and assemble a modern, minimalist bookshelf. This course is for those with basic woodworking tools and a desire to build.

title: Beginner's Silver Jewelry Making
subtitle: Create beautiful rings and pendants with sterling silver.
description: This course teaches you the basic techniques of silversmithing, including sawing, filing, soldering, and polishing to create your own jewelry pieces.

title: Beading and Wire Wrapping
subtitle: Design and create unique beaded jewelry with wire.
description: Learn the art of beading and wire wrapping to create necklaces, bracelets, and earrings. This course focuses on creativity and design.

title: Knitting 101: From Stitches to Scarves
subtitle: Master the basic knitting stitches and complete your first project.
description: This course is the perfect starting point for knitters. You'll learn the knit and purl stitches and create a simple scarf from start to finish.

title: Crochet Amigurumi: Cute Dolls and Animals
subtitle: Learn to crochet adorable amigurumi (stuffed toys).
description: A fun and creative course on amigurumi. You'll learn the techniques to crochet small, stuffed animals and dolls using simple stitches.

title: Scrapbooking: Preserving Your Memories
subtitle: Create beautiful scrapbooks to cherish your favorite moments.
description: This course teaches you how to select materials, arrange photos, and add embellishments to create personalized and artistic scrapbooks.

title: Digital Scrapbooking with Adobe
subtitle: Learn to create stunning digital scrapbooks using Photoshop and other tools.
description: This course is for those who prefer a digital approach. You'll learn how to use software to create virtual scrapbooks with photos, text, and digital embellishments.

title: Paper Folding: Introduction to Origami
subtitle: Learn to fold paper into beautiful shapes and figures.
description: A fun and simple course on the art of origami. You'll learn to fold classic paper cranes, flowers, and animals with step-by-step instructions.

title: Modular Origami: Advanced Forms
subtitle: Create complex, geometric shapes by combining multiple units.
description: For those with basic origami skills, this course teaches you how to create intricate modular designs by assembling many identical paper units.

title: Introduction to Patchwork Quilting
subtitle: Learn to piece together fabrics to create a beautiful quilt top.
description: This course covers the basics of patchwork quilting, including fabric selection, cutting techniques, and sewing to create your first quilt block and quilt top.

title: Free-Motion Quilting Techniques
subtitle: Add texture and design to your quilts with a free-motion machine.
description: For experienced quilters, this course teaches you how to use your sewing machine to create intricate designs and patterns on your quilts.

title: Hand Embroidery for Beginners
subtitle: Learn the most common stitches to create beautiful embroidered designs.
description: This course introduces you to the relaxing art of hand embroidery. You will learn the basic stitches and create a small, decorative piece.

title: Advanced Embroidery: Thread Painting
subtitle: Use your needle and thread to 'paint' realistic images.
description: For those who know the basics, this course teaches the advanced technique of thread painting to create stunning, realistic embroidered art.
